description: This is a hand-forged collapsible tool that has two axe heads and sharp shovel-like tip on one end.  It can be used as a shovel, or you could chop an enemy up with it instead.
A flimsy pole made of wood with a basic metal spike tied to it.  It's barely sharp, and crudely constructed, but it will keep an enemy out of arm's reach until you can find something better.
